thread.title: MovieNews | Watch: Here's every James Bond kill from the past 50 years
thread.title_full: MovieNews | Watch: Here's every James Bond kill from the past 50 years - entertainment.ie

author: Brian Lloyd
title: MovieNews | Watch: Here's every James Bond kill from the past 50 years
text:
It's no secret that James Bond enjoys a martini and promiscuous women, but does he enjoy killing?
Judging by this 38-minute long supercut of every kill in the entire series, we'd say yes. This video, compiled by Auralnauts, shows every on-screen kill from Dr. No all the way up to Skyfall.
Totalling 363 kills, including 84 from explosions and 9 with his bare hands, it seems 'oul Bond's a dab hand at offing people.
The video also counts some of his 'killer' puns.
Take a look.
Our favourite? Has to be when he gets Oddjob with the electric cable in Goldfinger. Either that or when Sean Bean dies in GoldenEye from the falling satellite.
Poor Sean Bean. Had to expect it, though.
Via YouTube
